definition[0]: apart from a particular person or thing
example[0]: The truth was known to no one other than herself.
example[1]: He doesn’t eat pork, but other than that he’ll eat just about anything.
definition[1]: except for a particular person or thing
example[2]: We never go to church other than for funerals and weddings.
example[3]: We know he lived in Fleet Road, but other than that we don’t know much about him.
